channel.title: LOL! The Evil Pickels! Must see!
channel.description:
Sooooo funny!!! :eek:
This girl has uber pickle phobia! OMFG ROFLCOPTER!!!!
http://youtube.com/watch?v=tUk_3eKL9Xk&feature=related

item.title: LOL! The Evil Pickels! Must see!

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

If I found it funny I’d say, and this is the kinda stuff I’d usually laugh at, however, I sympathised with them… It was sad.

Read full topic

item.title: LOL! The Evil Pickels! Must see!
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

I understand what you mean, but it just seems too much like something out of a seriously demented comedy. Maybe like Sarah Silverman, lol.
I did my best not to laugh, out of respect. But I seem to have failed; I just can’t hold it in.

Read full topic
item.source: LOL! The Evil Pickels! Must see!

item.source: LOL! The Evil Pickels! Must see!

item.title: LOL! The Evil Pickels! Must see!
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[quote=“Buzzy, post:12, topic:163723”]Personally, I’m petrified of possums. Deathly afraid. I don’t see the point in criticizing anyones phobia, no matter how unusual they are, because when it comes down to it, everyone is afraid of something, and we all get the same feeling when we come in contact with the thing were afraid of.

People who want a cure for it, well then I’d get as educated about the thing your scared about as possible. Me, personally, I don’t care that I’m scared of possums. I just ignore it, and when I come in contact with one, I freak out, but this just doesn’t happen enough to the point where it affects daily life that I would go through the trauma of getting over it.

I think that showing the girl pickles, just so she could run away screaming, and then coming back where there are no pickles is utterly fucking retarded, but thats what she gets for exhibiting her phobia on a low rank trash show like Maury. If they really wanted her to get over her fears, they would trick her into finding pickles are harmless, or just trap her somewhere in a room full of pickles until she finds that pickles are nothing to be afraid of.[/quote]

I have a serious phobia of noobs.

Read full topic
item.source: LOL! The Evil Pickels! Must see!

item.title: LOL! The Evil Pickels! Must see!
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Personally, I’m petrified of possums. Deathly afraid. I don’t see the point in criticizing anyones phobia, no matter how unusual they are, because when it comes down to it, everyone is afraid of something, and we all get the same feeling when we come in contact with the thing were afraid of.

People who want a cure for it, well then I’d get as educated about the thing your scared about as possible. Me, personally, I don’t care that I’m scared of possums. I just ignore it, and when I come in contact with one, I freak out, but this just doesn’t happen enough to the point where it affects daily life that I would go through the trauma of getting over it.

I think that showing the girl pickles, just so she could run away screaming, and then coming back where there are no pickles is utterly fucking retarded, but thats what she gets for exhibiting her phobia on a low rank trash show like Maury. If they really wanted her to get over her fears, they would trick her into finding pickles are harmless, or just trap her somewhere in a room full of pickles until she finds that pickles are nothing to be afraid of.

Read full topic
